Question: In 1861, this person's remains were entombed in a porphyry sarcophagus in the crypt under the dome at Les Invalides.
Hints: The movement toward national unification in Italy was similarly precipitated by this personic rule.
After this he was generally referred to as this person rather than Bonaparte.
This person had a civil marriage with Joséphine de Beauharnais, without religious ceremony, on 9 March 1796.
